question: Is there any paper that seamlessly integrates the multigrid structure in operator learning for solving partial differential equations (PDEs)?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: Is there any paper that seamlessly integrates the multigrid structure in operator learning for solving partial differential equations (PDEs)?
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: MgNO: Efficient Parameterization of Linear Operators via Multigrid
